name: MHTOCSMMBloodTransfusion
title: MH TOC SMM ValueSet for the Blood Transfusion Indicator
description: ValueSet for Severe Maternal Morbidity (SMM) indicator: Blood Transfusion. Includes relevant ICD-9-CM and ICD-10-PCS procedure codes.
